text: ahm yaqsimun alnubuat fydewnha hayth shawu? nahn qasamna baynahum maeishatahum fi hayatihim aldunya min alarzaq walaqwat, warafaena baedahum fawq baed drjat: hdha ghny whdha fqyr, whdha qwy whdha deyf; liakun bedhm musakhkharana libaed fi almeash. warahmat rabik -ayha alrswl- b'idkhalhm aljanat khayr mimaa yajmaeun min hutam aldunya alfany
